principalPage.title: Fundamentals of logic
principalPage.paragraph: Logic is a science that studies the structure or forms of human thought (such as propositions, concepts and reasoning) to establish valid laws and principles to obtain points of view of truth.
principalPage.paragraph2: Logic plays an important role in computer science (databases, computational complexity, programming languages, artificial intelligence, design and verification of hardware and software systems, etc.). It is definitely one of the fundamentals that provide the necessary maturity and agility to assimilate the concepts, languages, techniques and computer tools that will emerge in the future.
